lines.text: You sound like a very sad and bitter old lady, Ben.
Can't trust women - even when they're dead!
Moaka, please do not refer to the reverend and I as Big Man God and Mama Jesus Christ. You're putting your soul in jeopardy.
You should feel flattered, missy. Not everyone gets offered to the gods.
Just the women.

[about to duel with Capt. Bully Hayes]
Captain Hayes!
Admiral!
Count!
Whatever!

[to an interviewer, while waiting to be hanged]
Are you putting down in that book that I'm a pirate? Good! Because I am! Oh, I never flew the skull and crossbones. That's for your fictioneers. But I have sought pleasure and profit all my life at sea without regard for any man's law. That's not to say I didn't have my morals and standards! Sure, I had morals and standards. I never killed anyone who didn't have it coming. I never cheated an honest man. I never pillaged and I never raped.
Well, in a manner of speaking, I suppose one could say that, yes.

Good! Because I am! And a damn good one, too. No I never flew the skull and crossbones. That's for your fictioneers. But I have sought pleasure and profit all of my life at sea with no regard for any man's law. That's not to say without morals and standards! I got morals and standards. I never killed anybody who didn't have it coming. I never cheated an honest man. I never pillaged and I never raped.
If you want Ben, you don't knock on his front door.
He wouldn't answer?
He'd blow your brains out.
Not much of a drinker, are you.
No.
Well, it's a useful habit sometimes.
Like now?
[belches]
[laughs]
I'd like to apologize.
For what?
I was very quick to judge you.
Aw, what do they say, son? Don't judge unle... , no, let's see, judge not, judge not, judge YE not...
Judge not lest ye be judged. Matthew 7, verse 1.
Hmm.
You knew what you were doing in Samoa. It would have worked out if it wasn't for me.
Oh, don't feel badly 'cause you don't know your way around a whorehouse.
Pease man, what bring? Happy me good now.

[points to von Rittenberg]
This be white king.

[whispers]
Count! I'm a count!

[whispers]
He wouldn't know a count from a bucket of shit, but he does know king.
